description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical reproduction of the Great Seal of the United States, with letterpress text, printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 14 pp.

title: Revolutionary, Dangerous Gear for Dangerous Times: Boycott Corporate America
